name: The Icons Set: Hydrating Primer + Cream Bronzer
about: What it is:¬† A limited-edition set featuring a dewy primer that grips makeup for up to 12 hours and cream bronzer stick for naturally sunkissed skin in seconds...Highlighted Ingredients:.- Blue Agave Extract: Grips makeup to prevent melting, fading, and caking..- Hyaluronic Acid and Niacinamide (Vitamin B3): Boosts hydration to visibly smooth uneven texture..- Mango Butter, Avocado Oil, and Apricot Oil: Nourishes skin, boost hydration, and make formula creamy and blendable...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also gluten-free and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know:¬†Meet the two Milk Makeup viral bestsellers that your makeup bag‚Äôs been missing. Travel-size Hydro Grip Primer is a silicone-free, oil-free makeup primer that helps makeup go on smoothly and stay locked on for up to 12 hours. It‚Äôs made with hyaluronic acid and niacinamide, so skin looks glowy, never greasy. Full-size Matte Bronzer in Baked‚Äôs (medium bronze) creamy formula builds and blends seamlessly for sunkissed skin in seconds. Don‚Äôt let the size fool you‚Äîit's got over 1000 swipes per stick...This Set Contains:.- 0.19 oz/ 5.7 g Matte Bronzer in Baked (tan bronze).- 0.33 oz/ 10 mL Hydro Grip Primer..
ingredients: Hydro Grip Primer: .Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Water, Water/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Alcohol Denat., PEG-150 Distearate, Polyglyceryl-10 Eicosanedioate/Tetradecanedioate, Diglycerin, Cannabis Sativa (Hemp) Seed Extract, Opuntia Ficus-Indica Flower Extract, Prunus Avium (Sweet Cherry) Flower Extract, Agave Tequilana Leaf Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Niacinamide, Sorbitol, Pullulan, Inositol, Betaine, Carbomer, Maltose, Xylitol, Sodium Hydroxide, PVP, Propylene Glycol, Panthenol, Vegetable Amino Acids, Sodium Phytate, Citric Acid, Alcohol, Benzoic Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Dehydroacetic Acid, Benzyl Alcohol, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol....Matte Bronzer (Baked): .Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Wax, Coconut Alkanes, Silica, Candelilla Cera/Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax/Cire de Candelilla, Kaolin, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Wax, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Bis-Stearyl Dimethicone, Fragrance (Parfum), Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil/Huile V√©g√©tale Hydrog√©n√©e, Isopropyl Titanium Triisostearate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sorbitan Tristearate, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Hydro Grip Primer:.-Pump one to two shots of primer onto the back of your hand..-Blend a thin layer onto clean skin before makeup application..-Let the formula set for one minute to absorb and activate grip for all-day hold..-Layer foundation and other makeup on top for a smooth application that lasts all day, or wear alone for a glassy, hydrated, fresh face..-End your routine with Hydro Grip Set + Refresh Spray (sold separately) for extra long-lasting makeup..-Pro tip: To prevent pilling, let skincare and suncreen fully absorb before primer application....Matte Bronzer:.-How to open: Twist product up half-an-inch with protective disk still on. Then gently twist disk off, don't flick or pull..-Swipe onto cheekbones, forehead, and chin (anywhere sun naturally hits)..-Sweep onto collarbones, arms, and legs for an allover bronze..-Blend with your fingertips, a brush, or a sponge..-For a contoured look, pair with Milk Makeup Sculpt Stick (sold separately)..-Pro tip: Before applying, warm the bronzer stick directly on the back of your hand to make it blend even more seamlessly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a mixed opinion about this product. On one hand I am in love with the bronzer. It‚Äôs glowy and super easy to blend in, you can even blend it with your fingers. And the primer is super sticky and hydrating. On the other hand the packaging is kinda cheap. I can‚Äôt turn the bronzer back in and the bronzer is also kinda messy. The primer doesn‚Äôt stay sticky for a long time. For a high end product I kinda hoped for better packaging‚Ä¶
